text:
Loan Ecosystem Online | NYC | Full-Stack Developer | Full-Time | Onsite | 100k-130k | https://loaneco.net/ Loan Ecosystem Online is a platform that is transforming the way middle market loans are bought and sold. The platform drives efficiency into the currently outdated middle market loan syndication process.

Our current stack is Ruby on Rails, AngularJS/Angular Hybrid, PostgreSQL, Redis, AWS and Docker. You will be working closely alongside our founder and CEO, and be a part of the core team that shapes the company as we grow.

Apply her https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/933815169/ or email your resume to me at neil@loaneco.net
